interface.name: ricci_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run ricci.

interface.name: ricci_domtrans_modcluster
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run ricci_modcluster.

interface.name: ricci_dontaudit_use_modcluster_fds
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to use ricci_modcluster file descriptors.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of process not to audit.

interface.name: ricci_dontaudit_rw_modcluster_pipes
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read write ricci_modcluster unamed pipes.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of process not to audit.

interface.name: ricci_stream_connect_modclusterd
interface.summary: Connect to ricci_modclusterd over an unix stream socket.

interface.name: ricci_domtrans_modlog
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run ricci_modlog.

interface.name: ricci_domtrans_modrpm
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run ricci_modrpm.

interface.name: ricci_domtrans_modservice
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run ricci_modservice.

interface.name: ricci_domtrans_modstorage
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run ricci_modstorage.
